full_description:
ASUS ROG Swift 360Hz PG259QN 24.5" 1ms G-Sync FHD Gaming Monitor

ROG Swift 360 Hz PG259QN is the perfect gaming monitor for esports and fast-paced action games. This FHD (1920 x 1080) display features a Fast IPS panel with up to a 360 Hz refresh rate, 1 ms gray-to-gray (GTG) response time and NVIDIAÂ® G-SYNCÂ® processor for silky-smooth gameplay and ultra-realistic visuals. And of course, it has that distinct ROG design that lets everyone know that this is no ordinary gaming monitor. ROG Swift 360 Hz PG259QN is ideal for fast-paced esports titles like Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Rainbow Six: Siege, Overwatch, and Fortnite. In a world where milliseconds count, the blazing-fast 360 Hz refresh rate is the difference between victory and defeat. In the world of competitive sports, a 4% difference is a game changer. To put this into context, in the 2016 Summer Olympics, 1% determined the difference between silver and gold in both men's and women's 100m and 200m dashes.

ULTRA-RESPONSIVE PERFORMANCE- NVIDIA G-SYNC PROCESSOR

NVIDIA G-SYNC Processor gives you more of what you want in a gaming experience. Experience incredibly smooth, tear-free gameplay at refresh rates up to 360 Hz, ultra-low motion blur. ASUS Fast IPS panel technology allows liquid crystal elements in the display to turn on and off up to four times faster than conventional IPS panels, giving ROG Swift 360 Hz PG259QN a 1 ms GTG response time and little-to-no smearing or motion blur. A special non-reflective coating on the bottom bezel helps reduce onscreen reflections. The indicator light has been moved to the underside of the bezel, so there are no distractions in your line of sight. ROG Swift 360 Hz PG259QN features ambient lighting powered by ASUS Aura Sync, and it can be synchronized with other Aura-enabled components and peripherals. Organize and hide your cables to keep your gaming area tidy.

INTELLIGENT COOLING SYSTEM FOR 12% LOWER TEMPERATURES

The custom heatsink found in ROG Swift 360Hz PG259QN offers more surface area for heat exchange compared to those found in other g-sync displays, ensuring efficient cooling during marathon gaming sessions. ROG Swift 360Hz PG259QN uses convection currents to generate airflow within the monitor, with hot air exiting via the rear top vents and cool air drawn in via underside vents. This fanless cooling system ensures that operates silently and stays maintenance-free.

SILKLY- SMOOTH AND CRYSTAL-CLEAR GAEMPLAY- NVIDIA Ultra Low Motion Blur

NVIDIA Ultra Low Motion Blur technology uses backlight strobing to reduce motion blur to give you supersmooth moving visuals. HDR technology delivers visuals with a wider color range and higher contrast than traditional monitors for more realistic visuals. ROG Swift 360 Hz PG259QN features HDR10 to give you color and brightness that exceed that of ordinary displays. The ASUS-exclusive, integrated GamePlus hotkey offers in-game enhancements that help you get more out of your game. This function is co-developed with input from pro gamers, allowing them to practice and improve their gaming skills. ASUS GameVisual Technology has seven pre-set display modes to optimize visuals for different types of content. This unique feature can be easily accessed through a hotkey or the on-screen display settings menu. Flicker-Free technology reduces flicker to minimize eyestrain for improved comfort when you're embroiled in long gaming sessions. ASUS Ultra-Low Blue Light technology reduces the amount of potentially harmful blue light emitted by the display. Four different filter settings are available to control the amount of blue light reduction. Extensive connectivity options, including, I/O: DisplayPort1.4, HDMI (v2.0) support a wide array of multimedia devices. With an ergonomically-designed stand, it provides tilt, swivel, pivot, and height adjustments so you can easily find your ideal viewing position. The display is also VESA-compatible for wall mounting.

full_description:
LG 27GP95R-B 27 Inch UltraGear 4K UHD 144Hz G-Sync Nano IPS Gaming Monitor

The LG 27GP95R-B is a 27-inch 4K UHD gaming monitor with a fast refresh rate of 144 Hz. It's part of LG's UltraGear gaming monitor lineup and one of the first on the market to support HDMI 2.1 bandwidth, making it an excellent choice for next-generation console gamers. It provides an excellent gaming experience with low input lag, quick response time, and support for NVIDIA and FreeSync Premium Pro variable refresh rate technology. The LG 27GP95R-B gaming monitor also comes with FreeSync Premium Pro technology. It reduces screen tearing and stuttering and allows gamers to experience seamless, fluid movement in high-resolution, fast-paced games. The LG 27GP95R-B 27-inch UltraGear Monitor's color accuracy and consistency can be improved by using hardware calibration via the LG Calibration Studio.

UHD 4K (3840x2160) Resolution

The LG 27GP95R-B supports UHD 4K video and variable refresh rates up to 120 Hz via HDMI 2.1. This provides console gamers with an immersive gaming experience. full_description:
ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K HDR 138Hz OLED Gaming Monitor

The ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K OLED Monitor provides fully immersive gaming and entertainment experiences. This huge display is built for performance, with a 3840 x 2160 4K UHD resolution OLED HDR panel and a 1,500,000:1 peak contrast ratio, offering breathtaking pictures with deep shadows and highlights. Furthermore, its 138 Hz overclocked refresh rate and 0.1 ms reaction time aid in reducing motion blur from quick action sequences. With compatible graphics cards, NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility decreases screen tearing, stuttering, and other abnormalities. The ROG Swift PG42UQ is also an excellent display for making professional-quality films, photographs, and other content, thanks to its high performance.

Exceptional Color

The display of the ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K OLED Gaming Monitor is factory calibrated and supports 10-bit color with Delta 2 accuracies, supporting 98% of the DCI-P3 and 133% of the sRGB gamuts. True-to-life photos with dazzling highlights and deep shadows are delivered by High-Dynamic range support, which has a maximum contrast ratio of 1,500,000:1. The brightness is similarly 450 nits, with selectable adjustments to maintain uniformity throughout the screen.

Intelligent Cooling Design

The ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K OLED Gaming Monitor A custom heatsink helps to ensure optimal temperatures during extended gaming sessions, reducing the likelihood of issues such as image sticking.

NVIDIA G-Sync Compatible

NVIDIA G-Sync enables the monitor to dynamically adjust its refresh rate to the frame rate being output by the graphics card, thereby greatly reducing screen tearing, stuttering, and other artifacts.

2.1 Speaker System

The ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K OLED Gaming Monitor with Experience booming audio with the built-in SOUND BY Harman Kardon 10W stereo speaker system and 15W subwoofer. Plug a pair of headphones into the 3.5mm jack for listening privacy.

Rich Connectivity

The ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K OLED Gaming Monitor connects to your devices with one DisplayPort 1.4 input, along with two HDMI 2.1 and dual HDMI 2.0 ports. Four USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports are available for peripherals such as keyboards, mice, and webcams.

Tripod Socket

The ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K OLED Gaming Monitor An integrated 1/4"-20 socket allows you to mount a separately purchased webcam or DLSR camera stand onto a monitor for live streams.

Optional Uniform Brightness

When activated, the ROG-exclusive uniform brightness function decreases peak brightness to keep levels consistent for better viewing, even when changing the size of bright white windows. It also makes marathon gaming sessions much more comfortable for the eyes.

GamePlus & GameVisual Technology

Integrated hotkeys enhance your gaming experiences with a stopwatch, timer, crosshair, fps counter, and sniper function. Switch between Racing, MOBA, Cinema, RTS/RPG, FPS, sRGB, and Scenery presets to optimize the visuals for different types of content.

Aspect Control & Remote Control

Adjust the aspect ratio to create a custom viewing space, simulating 24, 27, and 34" widescreen displays. The included remote lets you sit back on your couch while adjusting the volume, inputs, and other settings. The ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5" UHD 4K OLED Gaming Monitor comes with a 03-year warranty.

This Monitor Supports Multi-Interface. 27" 4K OLED Display has a USB Type-C port. But the most notable aspect of this Monitor is centered around generating accurate Contrast and Colors for Professionals. This Monitor Also supports OLED Pixel Dimming HDR tech. For Wide and Accurate Color Reproduction The LG Ultra Fine OLED Pro uses the industry-standard DCI-P3 99% and Adobe RGB 99% Color gamuts. This wide range of color gamut enables the monitor to sufficiently reproduce color areas of multiple standards, and represent accurately the exact computed color values that film directors use. Commercial high-end cinema cameras usually support DCI-P3, and it is the basic color profile for cinema & VFX content. It Supports Standard Color Modes for Professionals. It features a Hardware Calibration allowing the monitor to enhance its color accuracy. So you can stably work with the same color environment even using other PC or devices. The supported HDR signals are BT.2100. it is the broadcast standard for HDR TV) PQ / P3 PQ which offers benefits to film and video editors. BenQ ZOWIE XL2566K 24.5" 360Hz Esports FHD Gaming Monitor

The BenQ ZOWIE XL2566K 24.5" 360Hz Esports FHD Gaming Monitor is designed to provide unsurpassed performance and responsiveness for competitive gamers. With a Full HD resolution of 1920x1080 pixels and a refresh rate of 360Hz, this 24.5-inch TN display delivers crystal-clear graphics and ultra-smooth action, allowing gamers to remain ahead of the competition with lightning-fast response times and little input lag. The ZOWIE XL2566K, with its diverse range of ports including 1x HDMI 2.0, 1x DisplayPort 1.4, and 3x USB 3.2 connections, provides smooth connectivity for game consoles, PCs, and peripherals, assuring a hassle-free setup for gaming aficionados. Designed with esports pros in mind, the ZOWIE XL2566K monitor has BenQ's unique Shield technology, which reduces distractions and improves focus by shutting out extraneous light sources. The panel of BenQ ZOWIE XL2566K Monitor also has sophisticated features like flicker-free technology and low blue light, which assist decrease eye strain and tiredness during lengthy gaming sessions, allowing gamers to stay comfortable and focused for hours on end. Whether you're competing in competitive esports competitions or playing casual games, the BenQ ZOWIE XL2566K is the perfect gaming monitor, combining great performance, responsiveness, and comfort to elevate your gaming experience.

full_description:
MSI Optix G27CQ4 27'' 2K Curved 165Hz Gaming Monitor

Optix monitors use a curved display panel that has a curvature rate of 1500R, which is the most comfortable and suitable for a wide range of applications from general computing to gaming. Curved panels also help with gameplay immersion, making you feel more connected to the entire experience. Optix G27CQ4 curved gaming monitor features a 27" WQHD panel that supports resolution up to 2560x1440. This 16:9 panel allows gamers to examine bigger game scenes compared to other traditional FHD panels and put them ahead of other competitors. Such resolution also allows gamers to multitask with several windows displayed at the same time, providing the efficiency for them to achieve everything they want. Optix monitors are equipped with a 165Hz refresh rate + 1ms response time VA LED panel which has the most benefit in fast-moving game genres such as first-person shooters, fighters, racing sims, real-time strategy, and sports. These types of games require very fast and precise movements, and an ultra-high refresh rate and fast response time monitor will put you ahead of your competition. Generic monitor displays normally have a flicker rate of about 200-times per second, which is unnoticeable to the naked eye but can cause fatigue over time. MSI Anti-Flicker technology provides a very comfortable viewing experience by reducing the amount of flicker. Optix monitors are optimized to produce less amount of blue light displayed by the monitor so that you can game for longer periods of time without eye fatigue. By having a large viewing angle, MSI gaming monitors has more leeway for placing your monitor in your setup without giving up the optimal viewing experience. Colors and details will stay sharp at more angles compared to other monitors with fewer viewing angles.

full_description:
ASUS ROG Swift PG32UCDM 32” 4K UHD 240Hz Gaming Monitor

The ASUS ROG Swift PG32UCDM 32" 4K UHD 240Hz Gaming Monitor is a high-performance display built for immersive gaming. This 32-inch monitor has a magnificent 4K (3840 x 2160) QD-OLED screen with 240Hz refresh rate and an ultra-fast 0.03 ms (GTG) response time. It uses a highly efficient bespoke heatsink, an innovative airflow design, and graphene layer to improve heat management and limit the danger of burn in. The monitor supports VESA DisplayHDR 400 True Black, has a 99% DCI-P3 gamut, true 10-bit color, and a Delta E < 2 color difference, resulting in superb HDR performance. The optional uniform brightness setting ensures constant luminance levels. Using the DisplayWidget Center, users may access OLED Care services and alter monitor settings using their mouse. The connectivity choices are numerous, including DisplayPort 1.4 (DSC), HDMI 2.1, and USB-C with 90W Power Delivery.

Experience the Ultimate Gamechanger

The ROG Swift PG32UCDM 32-inch 4K QD-OLED display allows for astonishingly lifelike gaming and entertainment experiences. Plus, a 240 Hz refresh rate assures buttery-smooth images and reduces motion blur, giving you an advantage in fast-paced gaming.

Uniform Brightness

When enabled, the ROG-exclusive Uniform Brightness setting in the OSD menu reduces peak brightness to provide consistent levels for improved viewing, even when altering the size of brilliant white windows. This technology of ROG Swift PG32UCDM makes lengthy gaming sessions more pleasant by decreasing the possible strain on the eyes caused by severe brightness changes.

Advantages of Qd-OLED Technology

QD-OLED technology's incredibly high contrast ratio of ROG Swift PG32UCDM monitor offers the deepest blacks and vibrant colors. Furthermore, an impressive 0.03 ms gray-to-gray (GTG) reaction time offers ultra-smooth, low-latency gameplay.

Advanced Custom Heatsink

The ROG Swift PG32UCDM features a unique passive heatsink that promotes heat dissipation. In addition, the monitor's rear cover has top vents that assist cooling and lessen the possibility of burn-in.
